data.title: SPX Market Timing, Proprietary Futures & Options Trading Services. Better Data. Better Trades. Hamzei Analytics.
data.meta_description: Trend is your Friend - Hamzei Analytics
data.text:
2015-10-17 Timer Digest Top Timers Ranking comes out and Fari Hamzei is ranked 1-1-2 in this great Nation. 2015-10-11 Streaming Audio v3 for HFT Index Futures Chatroom, led by Ethan Premock, is released. Members go ecstatic. 2015-10-08 Proactive Market Timing led by Fari Hamzei is launched. 2015-10-05 Timer Digest Top Timers Ranking comes out and Fari Hamzei is ranked 1-1-3 in this great Nation. 2015-09-14 Timer Digest Top Timers Ranking comes out and Fari Hamzei is ranked 1-1-5 in this great Nation. 2015-06-01 HFT FOREX led by the Captain, offering AUTO-TRADING thru five Global FX Brokers, is relaunched. 2015-01-07 HFT OTF led by Fari Hamzei is launched. 2014-11-27 Fari Hamzei drops his target for WTI Crude Oil to $50 per barrel, FOB Cushing, OK. 2014-09-04 Fari Hamzei calls for WTI Crude Oil to trade at $60 per barrel, FOB Cushing, OK, on his @StocksNJocks & @Benzinga Interviews and gets tons of hate mail. 2014-08-21 HFT FOREX led by Ashraf Laidi, offering AUTO-TRADING thru three Global FX Brokers, is launched. 2014-06-30 Fari Hamzei is ranked FIRST in the Nation for the first half of 2014 by Timer Digest. 2014-05-15 @HamzeiAnalytics crosses 150,000 Followers on Twitter. 2012-09-24 HFT Currency Futures led by Jim Iuorio is launched. 2012-08-22 HFT Bonds & Notes led by George Cavaligos is launched. 2012-07-01 @HamzeiAnalytics crosses 100,000 Followers on Twitter. 2012-02-09 HFT Premium led by Brad Sullivan Laidi is launched. 2012-02-01 HFT Stocks & Options led by Fari Hamzei & the Admiral is launched. 2011-10-15 HFT Index Futures led by Fari Hamzei is launched. 2011-04-26

thru 27 The FIFTH Three Gurus Global Derivatives Webinar is here. 2011-02-19 Fari Hamzei is ranked FIRST in the Nation for the last 52 weeks by Timer Digest. 2010-02-12 Fari Hamzei is ranked SECOND in the Nation for the last 52 weeks by Timer Digest. 2011-02-01 @HamzeiAnalytics crosses 40,000 Followers on Twitter. 2011-01-19 HamzeiAnalytics swtiches to MSFT Media Services as its Audio/Video Server, a new feature, soon to be added to HFT DeskTop. 2011-01-07 Fari Hamzei is ranked 7th in the Nation for the last 52 weeks by Timer Digest. 2010-12-31 Fari Hamzei is ranked 4th in the Nation for the last 26 weeks by Timer Digest. 2010-12-08 @HamzeiAnalytics crooses 30,000 Followers on Twitter. 2010-11-18 HamzeiAnalytics HAL4 Server comes online to better manage HFT DeskTop. 2010-11-05 HamzeiAnalytics Server Rack gets its own FED-compliant VPN Router to better protect its resources. 2010-10-14 HamzeiAnalytics introduces HA Wiki. 2010-10-10 HamzeiAnalytics introduces new HFT DeskTop. 2010-09-07 @HamzeiAnalytics crooses 20,000 Followers on Twitter. 2010-07-07 HamzeiAnalytics introduces HA-100 as our updated Universe. 2010-07-01 HamzeiAnalytics introduces two new private Twitter Feeds for trading TF and FOREX. 2010-03-03 We are very excited about our fourth Three Gurus Global Trading Webinar. 2010-01-01 @HamzeiAnalytics crooses 10,000 Followers on Twitter. 2009-11-10

thru 12 The Three Gurus Plus at CBOE Options Webinar is here. 2009-11-05 Wall St Cheat Sheet interviews Fari Hamzei. 2009-11-04 MissTrade interviews Fari Hamzei, Part II. 2009-11-03 Hamzei Analytics deploys its Educational Webinars content on Amazon CloudFront Servers (Content Delivery Network) for lower latency and higher data transfer speeds than Amazon S3 Servers. 2009-09-18 MissTrade interviews Fari Hamzei, Part I. 2009-08-07 Our covted SP1-MoMo Chart was featured on Chart Junkie Section of Wall St Cheat Sheet website SPX Chart Analysis. 2009-08-05 Fari Hamzei was quoted today in Wall St Cheat Sheet website Demystifying High Frequency Trading. 2009-07-27 Fari Hamzei was quoted today in Barron's options column The Striking Price. 2009-07-26 Three more of our trading videos were featured by FINZ.tv. 2009-07-18 A video on Market Timing was featured on FINZ.tv. 2009-06-24 Master Traders was reviewed today in Wall St Cheat Sheet website Book Review: Master Traders. 2009-05-22 Fari Hamzei went SHORT on SPX at 877.00 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2009-04-14 @HamzeiAnalytics is launched on Twitter. 2008-09-19 Fari Hamzei will lead another Options Institute Master Session Seminar. Hamzei Analytics is proud to be part of this fantastic educational program at CBOE. 2008-09-07 Fari Hamzei went LONG on SPX at 1242.31 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2008-08-22 Fari Hamzei went SHORT on SPX at 1292.18 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2008-07-17 Fari Hamzei correctly predicted Google's price action immediately following its Earnings Report in a Barron's Article published on July 1st using Hamzei Analytics' most coveted proprietary trading tools. See What Next for GOOG Shares ? for details. 2008-05-15 The Three Gurus (Larry McMillan, Price Headley and Fari Hamzei) will hold their first Options & Futures Conference at Luxor Vegas Hotel and Casino. See The Three Gurus Website for details. 2008-04-10 Fari Hamzei went LONG on SPX at 1360.54 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2008-04-01 Fari Hamzei went NEUTRAL on SPX at 1370.15 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2008-03-31 Fari Hamzei is ranked FIRST for stock market timing for the last 3 months days, 6 months, and SECOND for the last 12 months, according to Timer Digest. 2008-03-17 Fari Hamzei went LONG on SPX at 1276.60 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2008-03-10 Fari Hamzei went NEUTRAL on SPX at 1273.39 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2008-02-07

thru 08 Fari Hamzei led another Options Institute Master Session Seminar. Hamzei Analytics is proud to be part of this fantastic educational program at CBOE. 2008-01-17

thru 18 Fari Hamzei was a special guest speaker at the DTI Two-Day Trading Seminar with Tom Busby, founder of DTI in Boca Raton, FL. Register NOW. 2008-01-09 Our esteemed colleague, and a good friend Brian Overby, Director of Education for TradeKing will speak to us our new Webinar Platform about Using The Greeks. 2007-12-13 Our esteemed colleague, and a good friend Joe Kinahan, Chief Derivatives Strategist for Think or Swim will speak to us our new Webinar Platform about derivatives trading. 2007-12-05 Our esteemed colleague, and a good friend Dan Sheridan, Founder of Sheridan Options Mentoring will speak to us on our new Webinar Platform about options trading and risk management. 2007-11-27

thru 29 Fari Hamzei attended FIA Show 2007 for OneChicago.com at Hyatt Regency in Chicago. 2007-11-15

thru 18 Fari Hamzei attended Trader Expo for ChangeWave.com at Mandalay Bay Hotel and Resort in Las Vegas. 2007-10-25

thru 27 Fari Hamzei was a sponsored speaker for CBOE and CME Breakout Sessions at Options Xpo 2007. 2007-09-27

thru 28 Fari Hamzei led another Options Institute Master Session Seminar. Hamzei Analytics is proud to be part of this fantastic educational program at CBOE. 2007-08-28 Hamzei Analytics introduces free webinars for their coveted Sigma Channels Scanner on couple of Saturdays per month. Sign-up is on our drop down menus under NEWS. 2007-08-28 Hamzei Analytics upgrades its Server Farm to Office 2007 to handle faster data rates caused by expanding derivatives trading. 2007-08-20 Hamzei Analytics was quoted in Wall Street Journal Market Beat Blog was the main source on how Fed Discount Rate Reduction impacted the August Expiration in the early hours of last Friday. 2007-08-02 Hamzei Analytics opened its Website and Virtual Trading Room Servers to everyone. Our esteemed colleague, Adrienne Toghraie, of Trading on Target coached us on how to trade like a Master Trader. 2007-07-12 Hamzei Analytics opened its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. Our esteemed colleague, Ashraf Laidi, of CMC Markets shared with us his views on FOREX. 2007-07-10 Fari Hamzei is interviewed by Angela Miles of CBOE-TV. 2007-07-07 Hamzei Analytics proudly released its Sigma Scanner v2.4 for SuperPlatinum Package. 2007-06-12 Hamzei Analytics will open its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. Our esteemed colleague, Price Headley, of BigTrends.com will share with us his thoughts on options trading. 2008-06-07 Fari Hamzei went SHORT on SPX at 1490.72 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2007-05-10 Hamzei Analytics will open its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. Our esteemed colleague, Jason Roney, of Sharmac Capital will share with us his thoughts about managed futures. 2007-04-19

thru 20 Fari Hamzei led another Options Institute Master Session Seminar. Hamzei Analytics is proud to be part of this fantastic educational program at CBOE. In this special session, participants visited the SPX Pit during Friday Special Opening and OEX Pit during the Closing when April Expiration Settlement values will be derived. 2007-04-12 Fari Hamzei went NEUTRAL on SPX at 1447.80 for the coveted Timer Digest's Market Timer of the Year Competition. 2007-04-10 Hamzei Analytics opened its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. Brian Shannon, of Alpha Trends will share with us his ideas about momentum stocks trading. 2007-03-20 Hamzei Analytics Financial Network is launched, with Videos and Podcasts using Revver & YouTube Distribution Networks. 2007-03-15 Hamzei Analytics opened its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. Our esteemed colleague, Fil Zucchi, the Founder of Zebra Fund, LLC shared his forecast for the Real Estate and certain Small Caps (techs). 2007-03-09 Hamzei Analytics proudly released its much anticipated Dollar-Weighted Put/Call Ratios for Commodities, to be followed shortly by Sigma Channels for Commodities, both as new additions to its flagship product, SuperPlatinum Package. 2007-02-28 John Studnicky, a professional money manager and one of our SuperPlatinum Subscribers, was quoted in Wall Street Journal Market Beat Blog on how Dollar Weighted Put/Call Ratios made him go SHORT 3 days ahead of the 546 Points Dow Plunge on Feb 27th. 2007-02-20 Hamzei Analytics forum on Quote.com's Raging Bull is launched. 2007-02-21 Hamzei Analytics' initiated EFS code for Outside Bar is released by eSignal. 2007-02-19 Hamzei Analytics was mentioned in a BusinessWeek article about Market Timing on pp. 80-81. 2007-02-15 Hamzei Analytics opened its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. Steve Todd, the Founder of Todd Market Forecast will share his forecast for the Equity Markets. 2007-02-14 MasterTraders was mentioned in Princeton Alumni Weekly on p 29. 2007-02-07 Market Timing AudioVisuals were uploaded to Google's YouTube. Watch us on YouTube. 2007-02-02 Blog was launched on Google's Blogger. Visit HamzeiAnalytics.Blogspot.com. 2007-01-25 Hamzei Analytics opened its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. Our esteemed colleague, James DiGeorgia, the Founder of 21st Century Alert shared his forecast for the crude oil and precious metals. 2007-01-05 Hamzei Analytics introduceed CI_Diff Indicator for TradeStation's RadarScreen. 2007-01-04 SFO Magazine reviewed Master Traders on page 94 of its January 2007 Issue. 2006-12-15 Technical Analysis of Stocks & Commodities Magazine reviewed Master Traders. 2006-12-11 Active Trader Magazine reviewed Master Traders. 2006-12-07 Hamzei Analytics released Sigma Channel Sorts with back-tested variable-threshold volume breakouts by market cap. This new sort is in addition to dollar-weighted put/call ratios, sigma channel compression and UniVols. 2006-11-11 Fari Hamzei spoke to the Burlingame, CA-based Trade Like Gurus options traders. 2006-10-20 Fari Hamzei was interviewed by PBS TV Station WXEL Ch42 in Boca Raton, FL. 2006-10-19

thru 20 Fari Hamzei spoke at the Options Institute Master Session Seminar. Hamzei Analytics is proud to be part of this fantastic educational program at CBOE. In this special session, participants visited the SPX Pit during Friday Special Opening and OEX Pit during the Closing when October Expiration Settlement values were derived. 2006-10-06 John Wiley & Sons published Master Traders, with Fari Hamzei as the Editor and one of the fifteen contributors to this one-of-a-kind, best-of-the-breed trading book. It is foreworded by Steve Shobin; and reviewed by Gil Caffray and other Wall Street luminaries. It is available in major bookstores, on Amazon in the US and Blackwell in the UK. 2006-10-03 Dennis Leontyev, our Strategist for HOTS & SuperHornets, and Mark Esposito, special project coordinator for OneChicago.com will host a special webinar on Pairs Trading and Buy-Write Strategies using Single Stock Futures. 2006-09-29 Frank Barbera, CMT, a contributor to Master Traders, was featured today in RealMoney today. 2006-09-26 The very first copy of Master Traders ships out of John Wiley & Sons HQ. 2006-09-22 Sally Limantour, our commodity strategist, was quoted today in RealMoney. 2006-08-11 Fari Hamzei was interviewed LIVE by James DiGeorgia, Publisher & Editor of 21stCenturyAlert on the MoneyTalk Radio WSBR AM 740 from Boca Raton, FL. 2006-08-10 Master Traders was featured in RealMoney today. 2006-08-04 Fari Hamzei was interviewed LIVE by James DiGeorgia,

Publisher & Editor of 21stCenturyAlert on the MoneyTalk Radio WSBR AM 740 from Boca Raton, FL. Click here to stream this segment. 2006-07-27 Hamzei Analytics, LLC opened its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. Our esteemed colleague, Dave Miller, the co-founder of Biotech Stock Research shared his forecast for the biotech space. 2006-07-07 Hamzei Analytics, LLC, proudly releases its latest upgrade to its coveted Put/Call Ratio Engine. The v7.0 combines the best of TALnet (a div of Lehman Brothers) and Hamzei Analytics' technical capabilites, offering professional traders unparalleled reliability and speed. 2006-07-04 Hamzei Analytics, LLC, migrated its new hi-speed servers to a new hosting company, located in Agoura Hills, CA. 2006-06-06

thru 06 Fari Hamzei presented at the second two-day Options Institute Master Session Seminar at CBOE. 2006-05-15 Hamzei Analytics opened its Website and Trading Room Servers to everyone. It is our highest honor to present to you Pete Stolcers, the founder of OneOption.com Join us to find out why his website is the talk of the town. 2006-05-05 Fari Hamzei is now tied for FIRST PLACE for stock market timing for the last 90 days, 180 days, and 52 weeks, according to Timer Digest. 2006-05-04

The Conference Theme was "Controlling Risk and Staying in the Game." Click here to visit the transcripts page. 2005-08-22 Hamzei Analytics released its coveted Daily, Weekly & Monthly Indicators for Support, Pivot and Resistance Levels for eSignal v7.9.1. 2005-08-18

Leontyev, President and Chief Investment Officer of Milangy Management Company, LLC, is appointed the new Options Strategist and Editor for HamzeiAnalytics Options Trading Service (HOTS). 2005-04-28 Ike Iossif and Fari Hamzei will particiapte in the second of a series of chat sessions to be sponsored by www.FinancialChat.com. Three outstanding answers instantly earned a FREE month of SuperPlatinum package each. 2005-04-05 Fari Hamzei particiapted in the first of a series of chat sessions to be sponsored by www.FinancialChat.com. One outstanding answer instantly earned a FREE month of SuperPlatinum package. 2005-03-29 DV Indicator for Radar_Screen is rolled out. You can now add this unique indicator along with our CI for Radar_Screen to create even more customized and powerful Real-Time Scanner. See CI, CI Diff, DCI & DV Indicators for details. 2005-03-16 Fari Hamzei was quoted today in RealMoney.com for his bearish stand on GM since mid-December. 2005-03-16 Brad Sullivan was quoted today in RealMoney.com for his comments in the SuperPlatinum Chatroom yesterday. 2005-03-11 Terra Nova Trading joins Hamzei Analytics as its fourth Auto-Trading Broker. 2005-03-10 Fari Hamzei was quoted today by Todd Harrison's Minyanville.com in its Buzz and Banter Instant Messenger. Read our comment about the XAU. 2005-03-04 Hamzei Analytics' CI and DV Indicators were showcased in the March issue of eSignal's Exchange Online Newsletter. 2005-03-04 Fari Hamzei was quoted today in RealMoney.com for his near perfect February Non-Farm Payroll estimate. 2005-03-04 Fari Hamzei was quoted today by Todd Harrison's Minyanville.com in its Buzz and Banter Instant Messenger. Read Toddo giving us full credit. 2005-03-01 Fari Hamzei was quoted today by Todd Harrison's Minyanville.com in its Buzz and Banter Instant Messenger. Check out Toddo's snippet. 2005-02-26 HA500 is here. Our Universe now covers 500 assets! 2005-02-24 Fari Hamzei will hold the fourth in a series of chat sessions sponsored by eSignal.com. Subject will be "Trading with Directional Volatility and Central Intelligence Indicators." Each outstanding question will instantly earn a FREE month of Gold or SuperPlatinum package. 2005-02-22 Hamzei Analytics introduces Intraday Volume Breakout Indicator for TradeStation v8.1 Build 2143. 2005-02-21 Fari Hamzei is now ranked FIFTH for the last 90 days among some 150 market timers, the current issue of Timer Digest reported. 2005-02-09 Hamzei Analytics Directional Volatility (DV) and CI Diff Indicators' timebombs were extended for the last time to March 31st, 2005, covering TradeStation (go to the bottom of the last page) and eSignal platforms. Visit our TradeStation and eSignal forums. Membership to these forums is free of charge. These indicators will be part of eSignal Release 7.9 due out some time in late Q1 '05. 2005-01-12 Hamzei Analytics announced the release of its third-generation integrated Secure Chatroom with unlimited room capacity, powered by ParaChat. 2005-01-6 Hamzei Analytics, in its first year of participating in the Timer of the Year Competition, was ranked 11th among some 150 market timers, Jim Schmidt of Timer Digest reported. 2004-12-21 Hamzei Analytics announced the release of CI Diff Indicator for eSignal. For more information, please click here: CI, CI Diff & DCI Indicators. 2004-12-16 Hamzei Analytics announced the release of CI Diff Indicator for TradeStation. This indicator is added to our coveted CI and DCI Indicators Package for TradeStation. For more information, please click here: CI, CI Diff & DCI Indicators. 2004-12-08 Hamzei Analytics provided another great analysis tool, the Directional Volatility (DV) Indicator, free of charge till March 1st, 2005 for TradeStation (go to the bottom of the last page) and eSignal platforms on our TradeStation and eSignal forums. Membership to these forums is free of charge. This indicator will be part of eSignal Release 7.9 due out some time in late Q1 '05. 2004-12-07 eSignal Release 7.8 is finally here. CI and DCI Indicators can now be used by eSignal users. 2004-12-01 Hamzei Analytics announced the release of its coveted CI and DCI Indicators for TradeStation Version 8.0 on its website. For more information, please click here: CI & DCI Indicators. 2004-11-30 Fari Hamzei held the third in a series of chat sessions, titled "Introduction to Trend-Following Systems" sponsored by eSignal.com. 2004-11-15 Hamzei Analytics announced that Ike Iossif, President and Chief Investment Officer of Aegean Capital Group, Inc., a Registered Investment Advisory firm, has partnered with Hamzei Analytics as its new Options Strategist and Editor of its new and improved HOTS package. 2004-11-10 Hamzei Analytics presented 'Hedged Sector Investing: A Paradigm Shift in Protecting Sector Portfolios in the 21st Century' at the CBOE Options Institute Seminar in San Francisco. For details call 1-877-THE-CBOE (843-2263) and press #2. Be sure to mention Hamzei Analytics when registering. The cost is $50 per person. 2004-10-28 Fari Hamzei held the second in a series of chat sessions sponsored by eSignal.com. Subject will be "Momentum, Trend and Divergence Indicators." Each outstanding question will instantly earn a FREE month of Gold or SuperPlatinum Package. 2004-10-22 Fari Hamzei joined Jon Najarian and Preston James for the East Coast Options Bootcamp that was held at the Wyndham Baltimore - Inner Harbor. 2004-10-12 Fari Hamzei held another chat session sponsored by Traders-Talk.com . Subject will be "Introduction to Trend-Following Trading Systems." Subject will be "Introduction to Dollar-Weighted Put/Call Ratios." Each outstanding question will instantly earn a FREE month of Gold or SuperPlatinum Package. 2004-09-23 Fari Hamzei was quoted today in RealMoney.com. Subject was the birth of Dollar-Weighted Put/Call Ratio. Transcripts are available, FREE of charge, to Market Sentiment Alerts Subscribers. Steve Marriott won a GOLD Package. 2004-08-05 Fari Hamzei was quoted today in RealMoney.com.
